participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Caring and family-oriented, enjoys spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_1.background: my wife and kids are the best. my favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate. i've three children. i'm a plumber. i love going to the park with my three children and my wife.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and health-conscious, loves outdoor activities and has a strong preference for coffee.
participant_2.background: i don't drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker. i'm a huge coffee lover. i hate the color pink. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby.
